MY PROJECTS

HAVE A LOOK AT SOME OF MY PROJECTS...

Symposium Site Github

Description

- Symposium is a site where Lambda School current students and alum can interact and discuss various subjects built in a team of 3 members.

- A new admin console feature and site wide styles were added/updated to an existing code base.

Skills Used

- REACT/REDUX, NODE, EXPRESS and SQL

Refugee Site Github

Description

- Refugee is an informational website built using HTML5, CSS3, and React with 3 team members.

- This website was built in 1 week using axios calls, the front-end connects to a preexisting back-end api to display the data.

Skills Used

- REACT, AXIOS, HTML, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP

Recipe Site Github

Description

- Recipe Site displays the top searched recipes brought in from food2fork's api.

- Allows the user to search all recipes that include an ingredient.

Skills Used

- REACT, HTML, BOOTSTRAP

Phone Store Site Github

Description

- Phone Store Site is an e-commerce site.

- Allows the user to pay via paypal.

Skills Used

- REACT, HTML, BOOTSTRAP

Description

- Music Site is a single page application.
